features: Floor Squeegee Broom 180°ADJUSTABLE KNUCKLE JOINT: The Floor Squeegee can be adapt to any angle. Easy to clean the neglected corners. The squeegee head is about 13.38inch long.

Floor Squeegee Broom ADJUSTABLE HANDLE: The handle length can be adjusted as needed from 27 inches to 51 inches. The pole can be adjusted to 51 inches at most. The squeegee head is about 13.38inch long.
Floor Squeegee Broom RAPID DRYING: Extensive drying efficiently,saving the hassle of extra drying. The squeegee head is about 13.38inch long.

Floor Squeegee Broom MULTIPURPOSE: To dry floor surface efficiently and remove dirt and hair easily.Suitable for living room, kitchen, pool, garage, bathroom and can also be used as a window squeegee.
Floor Squeegee Broom EASY TO USE: No need to use excessive effort to dry floors and surfaces. Simply apply some light pressure to the water squeegee to get the job done.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We aim to facilitate your cleaning with a minimum of tools to save your time, money and energy. This Floor Squeegee is lightweight, multifunctional and anti-static. It can be used as Floor Squeegee, Water Squeegee or Window squeegee. It has 180°adjusting pivoting head suitable for any angle. Features: 4 Section Poles Easy To Use Perfect For Home Or Office Multifunctional●Adjustable Package Include: 1*Squeegee Head 4*Aluminum Poles The pole can be adjusted to 51 inches at most.

Installation Instructions Screw clockwise to connect top and 2 middle poles. Screw clockwise to connect 2 middle poles and bottom poles. Insert the bottom pole into the EVA part. Here is the complete installation process.
Features Easy to clean Detailed parts Sizes of different parts

Different Using Scenes You can clean different liquids on the floor. You can clean different liquids on the floor. You can clean different liquids on the floor. You can clean animal fur or hair on the floor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From skeptic to believer
reviews.reviewText: As a former bristle broom user, I had my doubts about this squeegee broom. Yet, its performance has completely won me over, especially because it leaves behind no trace of dirt or pet hair.Quality:This broom is surprisingly robust, withstanding regular use without losing its edge. The squeegee does an excellent job, unlike traditional brooms that often miss fine particles.Water Resistance:Unlike bristle brooms that get soggy, this broom works well even when wet, retaining its shape and cleaning power.Sturdiness:I was pleasantly surprised by how strong this broom is. It’s built to withstand heavy use without bending or breaking.Ease of Use:What's most impressive is how effortlessly it maneuvers into hard-to-reach places, thanks to its swiveling head. The ease of cleaning around obstacles without leaving anything behind, not even pet hair, is a significant upgrade.Ending Thoughts:This broom room has thoroughly debunked my initial skepticism. Its ability to pick up every last bit of dirt and hair, paired with its durability and ease of use, makes it a top-notch choice for any household. It's nice to finally find a cleaning tool that actually does what it promises, leaving floors spotless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my new garage floor
reviews.reviewText: We had our garage floor epoxied and needed something to clean up the floor after we drove our wet cars in. This works great for that...quick and easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I have a bit of bad luck when it comes to purchasing squeegees. It seems you typically buy the head and the handle separately, and they never stay together. Yeah, I really don't want to deal with the squeegee head falling off on the middle of a chore anymore. My neighbors hear me curse enough the way it is.This product works quite well for what I need it for. I have a back patio where water accumulates every time it rains or every time I water the lawn. If I don't clean it up, it gets kind of gross after a while. I use the squeegee to keep the patio clean, and it's about a 3 minute job with this squeegee.With the old fall-apart squeegees, it was about a 6 minute job.So I will say that this is a huge improvement, but with regular use, I don't anticipate it will last more than a year or so, and that's why I've marked it four stars.My personal opinion is that this is the perfect squeegee for places that don't have shower stalls. If you're bathroom has a shower but no stall, you'd typically need a squeegee to clean the floor after using the shower. I think that is likely what this squeegee is perfect for, as it is the perfect size for a task like that.If you need it to clean a larger area, though, the head could be a tad larger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have a pet and any hard floor surface, buy this now.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to try out on my hardwood floors for the in between cleaning when I’m not vacuuming/steam mopping. Oh my god, this is one of the best purchases I’ve made. I bought one for downstairs and upstairs. It’s incredible at picking up all the cat hair in hard to reach places and it’s incredibly lightweight to handle and slim to store. Just do your floors a favor and buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did Not Meet Expectations
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this does work ok, however, the blade is thick and not straight (kind of wavy), so it loses contact with the floor when I am sweeping and I have to go over what I have done one or more times. The thick blade won't get in the baseboard/wall joint.It does do a good job on the straightaway and doesn't hold on to dog hair. I will continue to use it, but will not reorder. I expect it to have a short life because of how malleable it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Product Yocada Floor Squeegee Broom works beautifully. I have a stand-in shower and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This absolutely peels cat hair off my carpet. Requires a little elbow grease but amazing what it does. You can get the edges and corners really well that you don't get with a vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Squeegee is not rubber
reviews.reviewText: It works ok as a long handled water pusher for my shower room but I still need a rubber one for the glass door.
No funciona, no jala bien el agua y se dobla mientras lo usas.
Great for sweeping away water from the bath area next to the shower.

Los materiales de construcción son muy endebles, si se le aplica algo de fuerza parece romperse, la cabeza del jalador es de un material que no se adapta a la textura del suelo y tienes que repetir la tarea varias veces, no cumple su proposito, quisiera devolverlo, no lo recomiendo
